values.description:
Welcome to P H Warr plc.

P H Warr plc is a leading provider of Property & Construction Surveying services delivered from our network of offices in London, Brighton, Southampton, Bournemouth, Exeter, Tripoli and Casablanca. We are a dynamic, diverse organisation and have grown strongly through repeat business, referrals and acquisitions since our inception in 1992.

P H Warr plc's technical and professional capability along with our two decades of project experience and can-do attitude allow us to respond pro-actively to provide maximum value consultancy services.  Our client-focused and innovative ethos means that we tailor our services - Project Management, Quantity Surveying, Building Surveying, Construction Health and Safety, Environmental and Sustainability - to meet our clients' needs and objectives.

We actively establish and understand our clients' organisational and project objectives from the outset, and this proven formula has earned the respect of an extensive portfolio of blue-chip and international clients.

We are now recruiting worldwide.  Please visit us at http://www.phwarr.com for more details.
values.name: P H Warr plc

values.description:
Based in sunny Brighton, Glue Media is a social media marketing company that provides custom solutions to a wide variety of local industries; including retail, events and music.

Helping to give local businesses and brands the online presence they need to take on the big boys, Glue Media aims to make the bond between customer and proprietor stronger than ever.
values.name: Glue Media

values.description:
We're Emberlane; a creative studio based out of Brighton in the United Kingdom.

WHAT WE DO
Creative direction, brand/identity development, graphic design, web design and web development.

Whether the right solution involves developing your brand identity, designing a piece of literature for print or building your website, solutions are bespoke, project-specific and never off-the-shelf.

We build lasting relationships and we're proud to have a growing list of satisfied clients.
values.name: Emberlane

values.description:
Founded in 1984 by Robyn Bevan,  Holiday World Travel is one of Brighton's preeminent travel agencies.

An award winning affiliate member of the Jetset Travelworld Group, Holiday World Travel is a licenced travel agent and member of IATA and AFTA.

Holiday World Travel are specialists in providing the holiday and business traveler with comprehensive and quality service. Their sales staff each have a minimum of 15 yeras experience and have travelled extensively.
 
No need to research flights, holidays or waste hours crawling through the Internet - just contact Holiday world Travel and their friendly staff will do the rest.
values.name: Holiday World Travel

values.description:
www.dowsettmayhew.com

We are an independent consultancy, providing comprehensive expert advice on all aspects of Town Planning. 

We have a client focused ethos which underpins our bespoke service. Professional, dynamic and practical, we are committed to delivering the best outcome and to meeting our client’s expectations. 

From our Brighton office we operate throughout the South and South-East of England.
values.name: dowsettmayhew

values.description:
PR PC Support is a IT Support company that specialises in supporting small businesses , home office users and home users in the Brighton and Hove area ( We also have clients in Guildford, Reigate , Caterham and Maidenhead - so don't be put off by distance ). 
We can help from the smallest problem , like a virus on a single PC to office moves, or server installs and builds.
values.name: PR PC Support

values.description:
Consultants and Recruitment specialists within the catering & hospitality industry.  Recruiting and supplying Chefs of all levels, managers, waiting and bar staff, housekeeping, kitchen porters/assistants and back office staff to hotels, restaurants, public houses, theme bars, contract caterers, nursing homes, schools, hospitals, clubs, events, holiday resorts, leisure industry, cruises ships, conference centres, private homes, food production, in-flight, food development and more...

Branches offices located in Bath, Brighton, Bristol, Cardiff, Cheltenham, Coventry, Exeter, London, Southampton, Swindon.  All spearheaded by ex industry consultants who fully understand Client needs.
values.name: Catering Services International

values.description:
Bite Studio is an award winning user experience, design & development agency based in the heart of Brighton. We work with some great high profile brands, providing software development, mobile development, user experience, user testing and interactive installations. 

We continuously strive to push the boundaries of technology, usability and user interaction. We are not satisfied with just building digital systems; every project for us is a portfolio piece. We strive to make the final product something of which everyone is proud. We get to work on some amazingly creative projects and have long term relationships with our clients. We are chosen for our creative thinking, complex problem solving, technical innovation and the vision we offer.

Our core sectors are:

- Publishing
- High end luxury retail
- Tech start-ups
- Interactive
values.name: Bite Studio Ltd.

values.description:
My name is Paul Burgess. I enjoy building well designed websites that look great and are easy to use.

I run Delarge Design, a web design studio based in Brighton on the south coast of the UK. 

Clients range from world famous musicians such as Royksopp, Moby and The Knife to small local businesses.

I'm always looking for new projects, I'd love to hear about yours.
values.name: Delarge Design

values.description:
Trident is an experienced and trusted provider of IT solutions and professional services. We’ve been delivering expertise and all types of technology and support to business across Sussex and further afield since 1991.

Our solutions span everything from software and hardware provision, network assessment and virtualisation services to disaster recovery, backup and flexible IT support agreements, all delivered within close working partnerships with our clients and designed around their specific needs, strategic objectives and business operations.

At our headquarters in Brighton, our experienced teams of consultants, engineers and support staff offer a rich source of business expertise and solid technical know-how. And we support any scale of small or medium-size business, from companies with limited or no internal IT expertise to multi-site, multinational enterprises seeking first-class IT solutions on a larger scale.

Our expertise and credibility are proven: we’re proud of our high client retention rate and accredited partnerships with best-of-breed vendors, including Microsoft, VMware, Dell, HP and Cisco. All testify to the quality of our advice, the excellence of our consultation and service and our ability to deliver the best IT tools as they become available.
values.name: Trident Professional IT Services
DSA Designs
values.description:
DSA Designs provide affordable graphic design, digital and litho print solutions throughout the UK and beyond.

My name is Deborah Aldridge, I am a self employed Graphic Designer based in Brighton. I have 9 years experience designing for the print industry, and in 2007 won the BPIF / City and Guilds Young Apprentice of the Year award. 

Following this in 2008 I won a Scholarship with the BPIF.

Whether you are a new business looking for a logo design and stationary to create a unique image for your business, or an established business needing to revamp yout identity, I will work hard to provide a design solution that is perfect for your needs.

I offer a full design and print service, which includes the following:

Logo and Branding, Re-branding, Business Stationery, Business Cards, Price Lists, Leaflets, Flyers, Posters, Brochures, Manuals, Menus, Appointment Cards, Invoice Pads, Modelling Z Cards, Photographic Restoration, Wedding Stationery, Promotional Clothing and much more.

Coachwerks is a community interest company based in the Hollingdean area of Brighton. Built and run by volunteers over three years, Coachwerks provides access to space, education and resources for our local neighbourhood and wider area, specialising in the provision of studio and workspace.
values.name: Coachwerks
Mi Bewick Photography
values.description:
Mi Bewick is a Scandinavian photographer, who's been living and working in London and Brighton&Hove for the last 12 years. She´s one of the official photographers for The Argus newspaper in Sussex.
Mi grew up in the Scandinavian countryside, where she got used to the vast open spaces with subdued colours and people with animals and nature close at heart. 
She carried on to make a career in the cities of Stockholm, New York and London, and has finally set new roots in the beautiful, quaint, yet trendy city by the sea, Brighton&Hove.
She now makes use of her diverse experience from the countryside and the challenging environment of high-end commercial shoots for the international market.
With eyes for delicate details and a heart in interior decoration and the superior traditions of Scandinavian design, her aim is to help you find the way to an outstanding end-result of all jobs, big or small.
Mi was educated at the GFU Photography School in Stockholm, The University of Stockholm, Stockholm Film school, New York University and New York Film Academy. She´s proficient in Photoshop after attending intensive course at Brighton University 2007. She has also done an Interior Decoration Course at the well-renowned Inchbald School of Design in London in 2008. She´s been living in the UK since 1998.

We are a family owned group of companies with head quarters in Trowbridge, Wiltshire's county town.

Established in 1879 by Mr Henry John Knee, we have been involved in many aspects of local business from refitting boats in the Bristol docks to rebuilding piers, including the Brighton pier and Penarth pier. We now focus on 3 core businesses - retailing, property and engineering.
values.name: H.J.Knee Ltd
D2D Sussex

values: Competitive rates for solus,shared & insert distribution.
Door to Door Campaigns to suit the needs of your business.
Help & Advice regarding areas, quantities, the best timing and types of leaflets necessary for success.

values.description:
Need to reach more local people?
We provide door to door leaflet distribution services in the Brighton and Sussex area. 

D2D Sussex specialise in the direct delivery of your advertising material. We target the households of your prospective clients, maximising its readership and impact. This successful and widely used medium reaches the public, increases customer awareness and leads to enquiries and sales.

values.name: Essence Design Ltd
values.description:
Robyn is the Design Director and sole practitioner of Essence Design Ltd.  After completing a 4 year full time Batchelor of Design in 1995 and three years working for architectural practices, she headed off overseas via Africa.  Robyn worked as an Interior and Architectural Designer in London, Edinburgh and Brighton. After travelling extensively, Robyn returned home and incorporated Essence Design Ltd in early 2004. 

Robyn is passionate about quality design and creating spaces that encompass all of her clients' needs, desires and wish lists. Robyn works closely with her clients and can offer full design service from conception to completion.

Please phone or email to discuss your next design project.

Interior Design, Architectural Design, Renovations, New Homes, Commercial Interiors and Contract Administration

values.name: SnE Consulting
values.description:
Technical services for IT & Entertainment

SnE provides IT services to a number of small businesses across many business sectors and locations.  I support mainly Microsoft servers doing file and print and hosting databases and other applications.  Other work includes the support of VPNs to remote sites / home workers and VoIP solutions.  I also have other people I work with to develop comprehensive web sites and hosting solutions.

In entertainment we can provide both sound and lighting to any event.  Lighting is my main area of expertise having done things from TV comedy to rock n roll to fashion shows to corporate events.  Currently I am working on the lighting design for a play at the Cock Tavern Theater in Kilburn “The under room” and lighting and sound design for a pantomime in Brighton called “Sinders is a gay”

Red Lotus Massage and Bodywork is a heart-centered, state-licensed therapeutic massage and bodywork practice located in the City of Boston's Brighton Center neighborhood. Red Lotus offers a variety of services, including massage therapy, CranioSacral Therapy, Reiki, and Zero Balancing sessions by appointment.
values.name: Red Lotus Massage and Bodywork

values.description:
Marsh & Co Accountants was founded over 35 years ago, since then we have become a leading firm of accountants on the south coast. We consist of over 250 clients therefore acquiring a vast range of knowledge and experience to suit your needs. 

Over the years, we have developed an excellent reputation for a prompt, reliable and professional service for both local and national businesses giving you that peace of mind that your financial requirements are in good hands. 

We pride ourselves on client relations and a partner is always available to take a phone call. Not to mention being ideally located directly between Brighton and Worthing so we are always happy to see clients whether it be for a meeting, bringing in records or just a word of advice.
values.name: Marsh & Co Accountants
6 Degrees South Health and Fitness
values.description:
6 DEGREES SOUTH HEALTH & FITNESS is not a Franchised fitness club. It is owner managed, so you are not just another number to us. We are member focused, our goals are your goals. And we can tailor your program to fit you, rather than make you fit a program from head office.

We work hard everyday to give you the service you both want and need but also deserve. 6 Degrees South Health & Fitness was re-named and branded in November 2004 after having serviced members of the Elsternwick, Elwood, Brighton, Caulfield and St Kilda area for more than 25 years, to become what it is today, a boutique, un-crowded, all inclusive fitness service.
